title: Fit Forum
description: A Full Stack Ruby On Rails Weightlifting Forum
features: Styled with Bootstrap, Searchable Forum Threads, Google OAuth

title: One Page News
description: This Single Page Application displays a wide variety of news as well as local weather.
features: Taps the NewsAPI and the Open Weather Map's One Call API. Users can browse and select up to 3 articles to 'favorite'

title: OBH Entertainment
description: A mock entertainment platform to browse and favorite a selection of titles
features: Account AND Account-specific users, Styled with Bootstrap, Utilizes Redux
